content: easy and fun christmas ornament video tutorial on youtube perfect for beginners every step is explained in detail in this video tutorial the reindeer and the candy cane are two video s both available on my youtube channel now also available as a written pattern on my website https //www mariskavos nl/free-christmas-crochet-pattern/ i used catania yarn but you can make this with any yarn please subscribe to my youtube https //www youtube com/diyfluffies https //www youtube com/watch v=8c0nnralpnw
